title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior (EB): The item should be selectable at the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Note that the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of selecting the item.
4. Try selecting the item a second time, which should result in successful selection.
